keep-what-you-need-delete-the-rest.original: Keep what you need. Delete the rest.
keep-what-you-need-delete-the-rest.value: Gardez ce dont vous avez besoin. Supprimez le reste.

static:hero-subheading-home-1.original: A starting point for developers looking to build a multilingual website with Astro and Rosey, using Bookshop's component-based approach to building and editing sites in CloudCannon. After a developer has set up the site, CloudCannon provides a user interface for non-technical editors to maintain the site's content and enter translations. Create your own copy, and start creating your own components to use in the CloudCannon CMS.
static:hero-subheading-home-1.value: Un point de départ pour les développeurs cherchant à créer un site Web multilingue avec Astro et Rosey, en utilisant les composants Bookshop de CloudCannon. CloudCannon fournit une interface utilisateur permettant aux éditeurs non techniques de saisir des traductions. Créez votre propre copie et commencez à créer vos propres composants à utiliser dans le CMS CloudCannon.

static:left-right-text-home-1.original:
As well as a translations workflow, some features come already set up in this template to help you start building components quickly, like:

  • Bookshop
  • Blog with pagination and tags
  • Image optimization
  • SEO Controls
  • Responsive header and footer
  • Font Awesome Icons
  • Schemas for adding new pages
  • Editable color pallete
  • Markdown styles
  • CloudCannon configuration
  • CSS variables
static:left-right-text-home-1.value:
Pour vous faire gagner du temps, certaines fonctionnalités sont configurées dans ce modèle, comme :

  • Bookshop
  • Blog avec pagination, balises et snippets
  • Optimisation des images
  • Contrôles SEO
  • En-tête et pied de page réactifs
  • Font Awesome Icons
  • Schémas pour ajouter de nouvelles pages
  • Palette de couleurs modifiable
  • Styles de démarque
  • Configuration de CloudCannon
  • Variables CSS

markdown:all-you.original: All you have to learn here is how to have fun. Just pretend you are a whisper floating across a mountain. You have to make almighty decisions when you’re the creator. There we are.
markdown:all-you.value: All you have to learn here is how to have fun. Just pretend you are a whisper floating across a mountain. You have to make almighty decisions when you’re the creator. There we are.

markdown:mix-your-color-marbly-dont-mix-.original: Mix your color marbly don’t mix it dead. Trees cover up a multitude of sins. The only prerequisite is that it makes you happy. If it makes you happy then it’s good. When you do it your way you can go anywhere you choose. We’ll have a super time. Don’t fiddle with it all day.
markdown:mix-your-color-marbly-dont-mix-.value: Mix your color marbly don’t mix it dead. Trees cover up a multitude of sins. The only prerequisite is that it makes you happy. If it makes you happy then it’s good. When you do it your way you can go anywhere you choose. We’ll have a super time. Don’t fiddle with it all day.

markdown:take-your-time-speed-will-come-.original: Take your time. Speed will come later. You can bend rivers. But when I get home, the only thing I have power over is the garbage. Let’s get wild today. If you don’t think every day is a good day - try missing a few. You’ll see. Play with the angles. We don’t have to be committed. We are just playing here.
markdown:take-your-time-speed-will-come-.value: Take your time. Speed will come later. You can bend rivers. But when I get home, the only thing I have power over is the garbage. Let’s get wild today. If you don’t think every day is a good day - try missing a few. You’ll see. Play with the angles. We don’t have to be committed. We are just playing here.

markdown:we-have-a-fantastic-little-sky-.original: We have a fantastic little sky! We’re trying to teach you a technique here and how to use it.
markdown:we-have-a-fantastic-little-sky-.value: We have a fantastic little sky! We’re trying to teach you a technique here and how to use it.

markdown:we-have-all-at-one-time-or-anot.original: We have all at one time or another mixed some mud. It’s beautiful - and we haven’t even done anything to it yet. Let’s make some happy little clouds in our world. Let your heart be your guide.
markdown:we-have-all-at-one-time-or-anot.value: We have all at one time or another mixed some mud. It’s beautiful - and we haven’t even done anything to it yet. Let’s make some happy little clouds in our world. Let your heart be your guide.

markdown:well-throw-some-old-gray-clouds.original: We’ll throw some old gray clouds in here just sneaking around and having fun. Only eight colors that you need. This is the fun part Put it in, leave it alone. Get away from those little Christmas tree things we used to make in school.
markdown:well-throw-some-old-gray-clouds.value: We’ll throw some old gray clouds in here just sneaking around and having fun. Only eight colors that you need. This is the fun part Put it in, leave it alone. Get away from those little Christmas tree things we used to make in school.

markdown:be-aware-of-whats-normal-for-yo.original: Be aware of what’s normal for your target customers’ inboxes. If you’re sending out emails to people who are on Gmail and Yahoo accounts, then there’s little chance they’ll get blocked because their addresses haven’t been flagged as spam yet. But if you’re reaching out to people with Outlook or AOL addresses, there’s a good chance your message will get flagged as junk mail and end up in their spam folder before they ever see it. Make sure you’re testing different types of addresses before sending out any mass marketing campaigns.
markdown:be-aware-of-whats-normal-for-yo.value: Be aware of what’s normal for your target customers’ inboxes. If you’re sending out emails to people who are on Gmail and Yahoo accounts, then there’s little chance they’ll get blocked because their addresses haven’t been flagged as spam yet. But if you’re reaching out to people with Outlook or AOL addresses, there’s a good chance your message will get flagged as junk mail and end up in their spam folder before they ever see it. Make sure you’re testing different types of addresses before sending out any mass marketing campaigns.

markdown:before-you-send-out-any-campaig.original: Before you send out any campaign using an email marketing tool, make sure that you have permission from your subscribers to send them emails. You can do this by asking them during signup or including a checkbox in the subscription form asking if they’d like to receive marketing communications from you in the future.
markdown:before-you-send-out-any-campaig.value: Before you send out any campaign using an email marketing tool, make sure that you have permission from your subscribers to send them emails. You can do this by asking them during signup or including a checkbox in the subscription form asking if they’d like to receive marketing communications from you in the future.

markdown:choose-a-reliable-esp-that-allo.original: Choose a reliable ESP that allows you to track opens and clicks so you can figure out which types of messages work best for your audience.
markdown:choose-a-reliable-esp-that-allo.value: Choose a reliable ESP that allows you to track opens and clicks so you can figure out which types of messages work best for your audience.

markdown:keep-your-content-short-and-swe.original: Keep your content short and sweet
markdown:keep-your-content-short-and-swe.value: Keep your content short and sweet

markdown:so-remember-to-keep-this-in-min.original: So, remember to keep this in mind and to always know that if you are sending out emails related to your business, be sure to follow-up with customers or clients and make sure that they are getting their emails in a timely manner.
markdown:so-remember-to-keep-this-in-min.value: So, remember to keep this in mind and to always know that if you are sending out emails related to your business, be sure to follow-up with customers or clients and make sure that they are getting their emails in a timely manner.

markdown:use-an-email-service-provider-(.original: Use an email service provider (ESP) that has been tested by third-party email certification services. This ensures that your emails will be accepted by the major ISPs. An ESP that offers multiple IP addresses, or one that allows you to use your own IP address if necessary. ISPs often block messages from unknown senders, so having your own IP address helps get around this issue.
markdown:use-an-email-service-provider-(.value: Use an email service provider (ESP) that has been tested by third-party email certification services. This ensures that your emails will be accepted by the major ISPs. An ESP that offers multiple IP addresses, or one that allows you to use your own IP address if necessary. ISPs often block messages from unknown senders, so having your own IP address helps get around this issue.

markdown:use-double-opt-in-when-sending-.original: Use double opt-in when sending out marketing emails. This means that the recipient must have previously agreed to receive emails from you before they can see content in their inboxes or on their mobile devices. This helps prevent people from signing up for newsletters they don’t want and can help protect against spam complaints from users who didn’t know they had signed up for something in the first place.
markdown:use-double-opt-in-when-sending-.value: Use double opt-in when sending out marketing emails. This means that the recipient must have previously agreed to receive emails from you before they can see content in their inboxes or on their mobile devices. This helps prevent people from signing up for newsletters they don’t want and can help protect against spam complaints from users who didn’t know they had signed up for something in the first place.

markdown:use-images-sparingly-(if-at-all.original: Use images sparingly (if at all). You might be tempted to include an image in every email you send out, but it’s important to remember that images can cause problems when it comes to inbox delivery — particularly when they’re used incorrectly or included in bulk emails from companies where the receiver doesn’t know who sent them. If you’re going
markdown:use-images-sparingly-(if-at-all.value: Use images sparingly (if at all). You might be tempted to include an image in every email you send out, but it’s important to remember that images can cause problems when it comes to inbox delivery — particularly when they’re used incorrectly or included in bulk emails from companies where the receiver doesn’t know who sent them. If you’re going

markdown:when-you-send-an-email-campaign.original: When you send an email campaign, you expect it to reach your readers, right? But what if the emails go straight to your subscribers’ spam folders instead of their inboxes? To make sure your emails reach their recipients successfully, follow these email delivery tips.
markdown:when-you-send-an-email-campaign.value: When you send an email campaign, you expect it to reach your readers, right? But what if the emails go straight to your subscribers’ spam folders instead of their inboxes? To make sure your emails reach their recipients successfully, follow these email delivery tips.

markdown:your-customers-dont-want-to-rea.original: Your customers don’t want to read lengthy emails full of text, so keep your messages short and sweet. If you have multiple products to promote, break up each product offer into its own email instead of sending one page-long message with multiple links embedded in it. That way, customers can easily find what they’re looking for without having to scroll all over the page.
markdown:your-customers-dont-want-to-rea.value: Your customers don’t want to read lengthy emails full of text, so keep your messages short and sweet. If you have multiple products to promote, break up each product offer into its own email instead of sending one page-long message with multiple links embedded in it. That way, customers can easily find what they’re looking for without having to scroll all over the page.
